reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty with a gorgeous print and appreciate its comfort, particularly noting it's perfect for hot summer weather. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one customer mentioning it hits just below the knee, and its lightweight material that's just right for summer wear. The sizing and fabric quality receive mixed reviews - while some find it runs a little big, others say it's roomy, and while some praise the beautiful material, others describe it as cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awonerfuldress made well for any occasion üëç
items.body: Perfect dress, sewn well, soft material, can use in winter with tights, tank top, turtle nech, warm socks and boots, for summer great with flip flops slip or dress it up with wedges, colors are so perfect, fits true to size, sexy, also modest for church, needs slip, can wear this anywhere and look the best ever time!! Read more
items.author: Cindy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable dress! Nice quality. Fast shipping
items.body: This looks flowy and loose fitting.. and probably is on someone taller without ample hips. It's adorable.. fabric is nice quality, colors are awesome.. but.. on my body, it's straight all the way down ( meaning no flair in the waist to thigh section. Almost sent it back but " shopped my closet" and added a long taupe lace vest and a boho metal & leather chain belt. Loaded it up with several different length handmade sterling silver and stone necklaces and an arm full of handmade bangles. It is now so stinkin' cute I can hardly stand it! Not a darned thing wrong with this item.. it's my shape that needs to be camouflaged ü§£ If you're on the fence.. try it. It just might need styled a little. Read more
items.author: Colleen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Fabric is soft and pattern is cute but don't believe their sizing recommendations it runs very large. Size down Read more
items.author: Diane Wyoming

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Awful, cheap China junk
items.body: Does not look like it does on the site. Looks like a potato ask on and colors are awful. Only keeping it because I live in hot climate and will be a house dress. Was hoping for something I could wear out. No way would I wear out of the house!!!‚Äô Where has all the cotton dresses gone all we can get on here is cheap Temu garbage. NOT worth over 30.00!! Amazon is going down hill FAST!!!! Doesn‚Äôt fit true to size at all very large and of course doesn‚Äôt shrink any because it‚Äôs not cotton. Only good thing I can say about it is the fabric is very thin for summer climate but probably see through. Read more
items.author: Tacy Oleson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recommend but colors are different. Generally, they are all darker.
items.body: These dresses are a cool option for summer (viscose versus rayon). I bought several, kept a couple and returned a couple. One was too small and did not fit like the others. All of the colors are off from the pics but found 2 I liked! Very comfortable. Some are fall‚Äôish colors and can wear with boots in the fall. I recommend. Might could have gone down a size but didn‚Äôt want to deal with that. Read more
items.author: Brady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: Beautiful dress love the fabric least it‚Äôs not that stretchy crap. I bought 3X and it was a perfect fit because I wear a 3X in women I went back and bought another one. I highly recommend top quality stitching is perfect. Read more
items.author: kate

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nothing so great- Its OK
items.body: Fabric quality is ok. Looks is ok. Fitting is also ok. Nothing so great about it Read more
items.author: AJ

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars This is not what I expected
items.body: I ordered this for a vacation dress because I like the colors and style, but in person the back was not very flattering and I have not yet worn it. This will probably end up being a nightgown. Read more
items.author: Katy

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Green Brown, Teal Yellow, Blue Purple, Peacock Blue Rose, Blue, Light Blue Rose, Light Apricot, Neo Mint, Light Green, Black, Teal Blue, Very Peri, Orange, Navy Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
